abstract: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.
snippet: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.
lead_paragraph: As Michaels Stores prepares to go public, the company’s chief executive, John B. Menzer, has been connected to the Mexican bribery inquiry facing Wal-Mart Stores.

headline.main: Michaels Stores C.E.O. Connected to Wal-Mart Bribery Case

byline.original: By Peter Lattman and Stephanie Clifford
